title: Ep. 222 - We Should Never Be Fans Of Politicians
description:
There has been a troubling merger of celebrity and politician. Increasingly, politicians are gaining groupies and fans rather than supporters. We’ll talk about why this is dangerous. Also, a video of a big game hunter killing a sleeping lion is provoking outrage. We’ll discuss the ethics of hunting. Date: 03-21-2019
